Description: The technical specifications to refer when using the package. Easy-going, offline supported (via web PWA installation), and detailed oriented. Courtesy from ZORALab's Hestia.

Designs.Description: This component was designed by the following creators:
Designs.Title: Designers

Designs.Description:
This component has the following dependencies (arranged in the order from
left-top to right-bottom):
Designs.Title: Dependencies

Designs.Description:
For HTML, ZORALab's Hestia employs the W3C native syntax for simplicity and
maximum compatibility sakes. ZORALab's Hestia recommends the following HTML code
structure for this component.
Designs.Title: HTML

Designs.Description: The minimum required HTML codes are shown below:
Designs.Title: Minimum HTML

Designs.Description:
ZORALab's Hestia heavily rely on CSS to style this component and offering its
css variables for customizations. Below are the list of available CSS variables
at your disposal.
Designs.Title: CSS

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --tile-layout
CSS PROPERTY : grid
DEFAULT      :
(>= v1.2.0)
"thumbnail" minmax(0, var(--tile-thumbnail-height))
"content" minmax(0, var(--tile-content-height))
"actions" minmax(0, var(--tile-actions-height))
/ 100%
Designs.Description: Affects the grid layout of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Layout

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --tile-overflow
CSS PROPERTY : overflow
DEFAULT      : hidden (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the overflow of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Overflow

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --tile-margin
CSS PROPERTY : margin
DEFAULT      : 2rem auto (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the margin of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Margin

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --tile-padding
CSS PROPERTY : padding
DEFAULT      : 0 (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the padding of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Padding

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --tile-width
CSS PROPERTY : width
DEFAULT      : clamp(22rem, 28rem, 32rem) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the width of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Width

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --tile-border
CSS PROPERTY : border
DEFAULT      : none (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the border of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Border

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --tile-border-radius
CSS PROPERTY : border-radius
DEFAULT      : 1rem (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the border radius of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Border Radius

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --tile-color
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : var(--body-color) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the color of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Color

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --tile-color-inverted
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : var(--body-color-inverted) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the color of the rendered component while in inverted mode.
Designs.Title: Color (Inverted)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --tile-color-print
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : var(--body-color-print) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the color of the rendered component during print mode.
Designs.Title: Color (Print Mode)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --tile-background
CSS PROPERTY : background
DEFAULT      : var(--body-background) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the background of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Background

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --tile-background-inverted
CSS PROPERTY : background
DEFAULT      : var(--body-background-inverted) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the background of the rendered component while in inverted mode.
Designs.Title: Background (Inverted Mode)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --tile-background-print
CSS PROPERTY : background
DEFAULT      : var(--body-background-print) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the background of the rendered component during print mode.
Designs.Title: Background (Print Mode)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --tile-timing
CSS PROPERTY : transition
DEFAULT      : var(--timing-normal) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the animation timing of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Transition

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --tile-thumbnail-overflow
CSS PROPERTY : overflow
DEFAULT      : hidden (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the thumbnail's overflow of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Thumbnail Overflow

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --tile-thumbnail-object-fit
CSS PROPERTY : object-fit
DEFAULT      : contain (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the thumbnail's object fitting condition of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Thumbnail Object-Fit

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --tile-thumbnail-height
CSS PROPERTY : height
DEFAULT      : max-content (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the thumbnail's height of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Thumbnail Height

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --tile-thumbnail-margin
CSS PROPERTY : margin
DEFAULT      : 0 (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the thumbnail's margin of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Thumbnail Margin

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --tile-thumbnail-padding
CSS PROPERTY : padding
DEFAULT      : 0 (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the thumbnail's padding of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Thumbnail Padding

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --tile-content-overflow
CSS PROPERTY : overflow
DEFAULT      : auto (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the content's overflow of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Content Overflow

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --tile-content-height
CSS PROPERTY : height
DEFAULT      : auto (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the content's height of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Content Height

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --tile-content-margin
CSS PROPERTY : margin
DEFAULT      : 0 (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the content's margin of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Content Margin

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --tile-content-padding
CSS PROPERTY : padding
DEFAULT      : 0 1rem (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the content's padding of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Content Padding

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --tile-actions-overflow
CSS PROPERTY : overflow
DEFAULT      : hidden (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the actions' overflow of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Actions Overflow

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --tile-actions-height
CSS PROPERTY : height
DEFAULT      : max-content (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the actions' height of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Actions Height

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --tile-actions-margin
CSS PROPERTY : margin
DEFAULT      : 0 (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the actions margin of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Actions Margin

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --tile-actions-padding
CSS PROPERTY : padding
DEFAULT      : 3.5rem 0 (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the actions' padding of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Actions Padding

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --tile-title-margin
CSS PROPERTY : margin
DEFAULT      : .3rem auto (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the title's margin of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Title Margin

Designs.Description: Fortunately, this component does not use any JavaScript. Relax.
Designs.Title: JavaScript

Functions.Description: Render the CSS output for this UI component.
Functions.Title: ToCSS

ObjectiveAndPurposes.Description:
This package's primary purpose is to provide user interface (UI) styling
specifically for tile-oriented values.
ObjectiveAndPurposes.Title: Main Purpose
